useCase.name: Camp Worker manages campers' schedules
useCase.description: Allows the camp worker to view and manage campers' schedules

preconditions.precondition: The Camp Worker is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: The campers' schedules are accurately displayed and managed.

useCase.trigger: Logged in camp worker wants to view assigned campers' schedules.

mainSequence.step: Request for campers' assignments from the system
Retrieve and confirm the list of assigned campers
Retrieve schedule and location information for each camper
Display the list of assigned campers and their schedules/locations
